channel.title: Need help with Admin rights
channel.description:
Hey there,
My question is how do I make someone Admin on a 718 RSPS lol, I can't figure it out.
Right 1 = Mod Right 2 = Owner
But I just can't figure out what Admin is. Can someone help me please I already tryd serveral numbers.

item.title: Need help with Admin rights
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Really? I can find guides on it in minutes…
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/423362-667-7-adding-more-donator-symbols-crowns-includes-matrix-718-a.html
If^ doesn’t work use: http://bit.ly/1hIhMT4

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Admin rights
item.dc:creator: @Duppan Duppan
item.description:
@Duppan wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:538437”]There’s technically over 4 billion numbers you can use for player rights. However, only about 3-10 of these are used at most.

0 - Normal player
1 - Moderator
2 - Admin
3- Owner

Usually rank 1 has a silver crown, and ranks 2 and 3 have a gold one. But anyone can edit it to hold more crowns.

If there is no third right for your players, you can always make “owner” privileges based off of usernames. Or you can modify your cache/client to load more crowns. No, I don’t know how to do that on a 718 but I’m sure there’s a tutorial.[/quote]

Yea, but I want to make a seperate login message for admins like ''Admin (NAME) has just logged in) because Owners and Mod, Donors etc. have that too and I don’t feel like removing those messages because then players won’t know when staff loggs in so the only option for me is making a whole new rank. Now I’ve searched google but didn’t really find any detailed guides.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Admin rights
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s technically over 4 billion numbers you can use for player rights. However, only about 3-10 of these are used at most.

0 - Normal player
1 - Moderator
2 - Admin
3- Owner

Usually rank 1 has a silver crown, and ranks 2 and 3 have a gold one. But anyone can edit it to hold more crowns.

If there is no third right for your players, you can always make “owner” privileges based off of usernames. Or you can modify your cache/client to load more crowns. No, I don’t know how to do that on a 718 but I’m sure there’s a tutorial.

Read full topic
